alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Bleckley; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, Wilkinson, southeastern Bibb, Twiggs, northern Bleckley, Washington, northeastern Houston and northern Johnson Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Downs to near Irwinton to Middle Georgia Regional Airport, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Sandersville, Wrightsville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Warner Robins, Davisboro, Tennille, McIntyre, Dudley, Harrison, Toomsboro, Oconee, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Riddleville, Robins AFB, Marion and Tarversville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Bleckley; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
